name: Processing Big Data with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight
tagline: Shared files for Processing Big Data with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight course
body:
![Processing Big Data with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight]
(https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Banner.jpg)

***

More and more organizations are taking on the challenge of analyzing big data. This course teaches you how to use the Hadoop technologies in Microsoft Azure HDInsight to build batch processing solutions that cleanse and reshape data for analysis. In this five-week course, youâ€™ll learn how to use technologies like Hive, Pig, Oozie, and Sqoop with Hadoop in HDInsight; and how to work with HDInsight clusters from Windows, Linux, and Mac OSX client computers.

To take this free course, register in [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/processing-big-data-azure-hdinsight-microsoft-dat202-1x). You can also view the demos from this course on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYM1ojPsaRARzSGVUh6Ae4Oy8gbAgiB9g)

### Course Materials
* [Slides] (https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/tree/master/PPT)
* [Handouts] (https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/tree/master/Slides)
* [Demo Files](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/tree/master/Demos)
* [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/Setup.pdf)
* [Lab Files](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/HDILabs.zip)
* [Lab 1 - Getting Started with HDInsight](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/Lab%201%20-%20Getting%20Started%20with%20HDInsight.pdf)
* [Lab 2 - Processing Big Data with Hive](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/Lab%202%20-%20Processing%20Big%20Data%20with%20Hive.pdf)
* [Lab 3 - Beyond Hive - Pig and Python](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/Lab%203%20-%20Beyond%20Hive%20-%20Pig%20and%20Python.pdf)
* [Lab 4 - Orchestrating Big Data Workflows](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Processing-Big-Data-with-Hadoop-in-Azure-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/Lab%204%20-%20Orchestrating%20Big%20Data%20Workflows.pdf)
